c74object.name: seq.divs~

method.name: in2
method.description: A list of integers establishes the subdivision to apply to future phasors to the first inlet. For example, a list of "2 3" will divide the first incoming phasor ramp into 2 equally-size ramps and the next incoming ramp into 3 ramps. When the count of ramps exceeds the length of the list the object wraps back to the beginning.

attribute.name: countsync
attribute.digest: When enabled, the first outletâ€™s step counter will reset each time the input phasor wraps.

attribute.name: syncupdate
attribute.digest: When enabled, changes to parameters are deferred until the phasor wraps.

c74object.description: seq.divs~ works like the subdiv~, but takes a list of values to be used on successive phasor signals.
